title: MobBountyReloaded杀怪后没奖励.Vault下载了..
author: Momo丶小凌

replies.author: xmy91
replies.txt_content:
Momo丶小凌 发表于 2013-2-12 08:03 
没有......
在控制台输入 mangaddp [用户组名称] mbr.use.*
例如mngaddp Builder mbr.use.*

replies.author: tzekinn
replies.txt_content: 试试把 plugin.yml 的 default:op 改成 default:true

replies.author: XiaoDao
replies.txt_content: 你设置每个怪物掉的钱了吗
